public class ConfigXmlConfigDescriptionProvider
extends AbstractXmlConfigDescriptionProvider
implements XmlDocumentProviderFactory<java.util.List<ConfigDescription>>
    Provides ConfigDescriptions for configurations which are read from XML files.
